com.teamonehundred.pixelboat

Class PlayerBoat

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.teamonehundred.pixelboat.MovableObject
      • com.teamonehundred.pixelboat.Boat
        • com.teamonehundred.pixelboat.PlayerBoat
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CollisionObject

    public class PlayerBoat
extends Boat
    Represents the user player's boat.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PlayerBoat

        public PlayerBoat(int x,
                  int y)
        Construct a PlayerBoat object at point (x,y) with default size, texture and animation.
        Parameters:
        x - int coordinate for the bottom left point of the boat
        y - int coordinate for the bottom left point of the boat

    • Method Detail

      • finalize

        public void finalize()
        Destructor disposes of this texture once it is no longer referenced.

      • initialise

        public void initialise()
        Shared initialisation functionality among all constructors.

        Sets stamina bar and durability bar textures and sprites. Initialises the bars' size and position. Initialises camera position.

      • updatePosition

        public void updatePosition()
        Updates the position based on the user's input.

        'W' key accelerates the boat. 'A' Turns the boat to the left 'D' Turns the boat to the right

        Updates the x and y position of the sprite with new x and y according to which input has been requested. The camera will follow the player's boat

        Overrides:
        updatePosition in class Boat

      • getUISprites

        public java.util.List<com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.Sprite> getUISprites()
        Returns the all sprites for PlayerBoat UI.

        This includes the stamina bar and durability bar.

        Returns:
        List of Sprites
